articles.content:

articles.title: Anglo American rejects BHP's plea to extend mega-merger deadline - BBC.com
articles.description: The £39bn mega-merger between the two international mining giants hangs by a thread.
articles.content:
Sean Farrington,Mitchell Labiak
UK mining giant Anglo American has rejected its rival BHPs plea to extend the looming deadline for a final offer on a proposed £39bn merger.
